name: Hat Panik
description:
Grab your hats ladies and gents! It's time to play the epic arcade minigame collection, Hat Panik!!

Battle against friends (or the computer, who is now your friend too) to win each other's hats!

Samurai Showdown

Quick! Like a flash! Wield your sword and steal the opponent's hat in this game of reflexes!

Tug Of War

Put your button mashing to the test, do you think you can trip up your opponent to claim their hat?

Hatbin Scramble

In the back of some warehouse you'll have to find the hidden hat before it's too late!
